e1.quote: Great leaders inspire greatness in others.

e2.quote: Belief is not a matter of choice, but of conviction.

e3.quote: Easy is the path to wisdom for those not blinded by ego.

e4.quote: A plan is only as good as those who see it through.

e5.quote: The best confidence builder is experience.

e6.quote: Trust in your friends, and they'll have reason to trust in you.

e7.quote: You hold onto friends by keeping your heart a little softer than your head.

e8.quote: Heroes are made by the times.

e9.quote: Ignore your instincts at your peril.

e10.quote: Most powerful is he who controls his own power.

e11.quote: The winding path to peace is always a worthy one, regardless of how many turns it takes.

e12.quote: Fail with honor rather than succeed by fraud.

e13.quote: Greed and fear of loss are the roots that lead to the tree of evil.

e14.quote: When surrounded by war, one must eventually choose a side.

e16.quote: Truth enlightens the mind, but won't always bring happiness to your heart.

e17.quote: Fear is a disease; hope is its only cure.

e18.quote: A single chance is a galaxy of hope.

e19.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

e20.quote: The costs of war can never be truly accounted for.

e21.quote: Compromise is a virtue to be cultivated, not a weakness to be despised.

e22.quote: A secret shared is a trust formed.

e1.quote: A lesson learned is a lesson earned.

e2.quote: Overconfidence is the most dangerous form of carelessness.

e3.quote: The first step to correcting a mistake is patience.

e4.quote: A true heart should never be doubted.

e5.quote: Believe in yourself or no one else will.

e6.quote: No gift is more precious than trust.

e7.quote: Sometimes, accepting help is harder than offering it.

e9.quote: For everything you gain, you lose something else.

e10.quote: It is the quest for honor that makes one honorable.

e12.quote: If you ignore the past, you jeopardize the future.

e13.quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.

e14.quote: In war, truth is the first casualty.

e15.quote: Searching for the truth is easy. Accepting the truth is hard.

e16.quote: A wise leader knows when to follow.

e17.quote: Courage makes heroes, but trust builds friendships.

e18.quote: Choose what is right, not what is easy.

e19.quote: The most dangerous beast is the beast within.

e20.quote: Who my father was matters less than my memory of him.

e21.quote: Adversity is a friendship's truest test.

e22.quote: Revenge is a confession of pain.

e1.quote: Brothers in arms are brothers for life.

e2.quote: Fighting a war tests a soldier's skills, defending his home tests a soldier's heart.

e3.quote: Where there's a will, there's a way.

e4.quote: A child stolen is a hope lost.

e5.quote: The challenge of hope is to overcome corruption.

e6.quote: Those who enforce the law must obey the law.

e7.quote: The future has many paths, choose wisely.

e8.quote: A failure in planning is a plan for failure.

e9.quote: Love comes in all shapes and sizes.

e11.quote: Truth can strike down the spectre of fear.

e12.quote: The swiftest path to destruction is through vengeance.

e13.quote: Evil is not born, it is taught.

e14.quote: The path to evil may bring great power, but not loyalty.

e15.quote: Balance is found in the one who faces his guilt.

e16.quote: He who surrenders hope, surrenders life.

e17.quote: He who seeks to control fate shall never find peace.

e18.quote: Adaptation is the key to survival.

e19.quote: Anything that can go wrong will.

e21.quote: Without humility, courage is a dangerous game.

e22.quote: A great student is what the teacher hopes to be.

e1.quote: When destiny calls, the chosen have no choice.

e2.quote: Only through fire is a strong sword forged.

e3.quote: Crowns are inherited, kingdoms are earned.

e4.quote: Who a person truly is cannot be seen with the eye.

e5.quote: Understanding is honoring the truth beneath the surface.

e6.quote: Who's the more foolish, the fool or the fool who follows him?

e7.quote: The first step towards loyalty is trust.

e8.quote: The path of ignorance is guided by fear.

e9.quote: The wise man leads, the strong man follows.

e11.quote: Where we are going always reflects where we came from.

e12.quote: Those who enslave others, inevitably become slaves themselves.

e13.quote: Great hope can come from small sacrifices.

e14.quote: Friendship shows us who we really are.

e15.quote: All warfare is based on deception.

e16.quote: Keep your friends close, but keep your enemies closer.

e17.quote: The strong survive, the noble overcome.

e18.quote: Trust is the greatest of gifts, but it must be earned.

e19.quote: One must let go of the past to hold on to the future.

e20.quote: Who we are never changes, who we think we are does.

e21.quote: A fallen enemy may rise again, but the reconciled one is truly vanquished.

e22.quote: The enemy of my enemy is my friend.

e1.quote: Strength of character can defeat strength in numbers.

e3.quote: To seek something is to believe in its possibility.

e4.quote: Struggles often begin and end with the truth.

e5.quote: Disobedience is a demand for change.

e6.quote: He who faces himself, finds himself.

e8.quote: When we rescue others, we rescue ourselves.

e9.quote: Choose your enemies wisely, as they may be your last hope.

e10.quote: Humility is the only defense against humiliation.

e11.quote: When all seems hopeless, a true hero gives hope.

e12.quote: A soldier's most powerful weapon is courage.

e13.quote: You must trust in others or success is impossible.

e14.quote: One vision can have many interpretations.

e17.quote: Sometimes even the smallest doubt can shake the greatest belief.

e19.quote: Never become desperate enough to trust the untrustworthy.

e20.quote: Never give up hope, no matter how dark things seem.

e1.quote: The truth about yourself is always the hardest to accept.

e2.quote: The wise benefit from a second opinion.

e3.quote: When in doubt, go to the source.

e4.quote: The popular belief isn't always the correct one.

e5.quote: To love, is to trust. To trust is to believe.

e6.quote: Jealousy is the path to chaos.

e7.quote: Deceit is the weapon of greed.

e8.quote: Without darkness there cannot be light.

e9.quote: Wisdom is born in fools as well as wise men.

e10.quote: What is lost is often found.

e11.quote: Madness can sometimes be the path to truth.

e13.quote: Facing all that you fear will free you from yourself.

e1.quote: Embrace others for their differences, for that makes you whole.

e2.quote: The search for truth begins with belief.

e3.quote: Survival is one step on the path to living.

e4.quote: Trust placed in another is trust earned.

e5.quote: If there is no path before you, create your own.

e6.quote: Mistakes are valuable lessons often learned too late.

e7.quote: Who you were does not have to define who you are.

e8.quote: You can change who you are, but you cannot run from yourself.
